Headline: A Drop of an Idea Starts a Ripple
Text: WaterSense holds stakeholder meetings across the country to get input on designing a national, voluntary market-based program for promoting water-efficient products.

Headline: EPA's WaterSense Program Launched
Text: Former Administrator Stephen Johnson announced EPA's new WaterSense program at the American Water Works Association's Annual Conference & Exposition in San Antonio, TX. Read the press release.

Headline: WaterSense is Growing!
Text: With the release of these first specifications, WaterSense is pleased to invite organizations that share a commitment to water efficiency to become program partners. Certified landscape irrigation professionals, professional certifying organizations, and promotional partners are the first partners eligible to join WaterSense.

Headline: Test Your WaterSense Quiz Unveiled
Text: WaterSense is proud to announce its new Test Your WaterSense interactive quiz. Help guide the water efficiency hero Flo through water pipes and answer water-efficiency questions while avoiding water-wasting monsters such as Sogosaurus and Drainiac.

Headline: 2006 Accomplishments Report Published
Text: Since it's launch on June 12, 2006, WaterSense has experienced significant growth and has big plans for the future! Read more on the program's inaugural year accomplishments in the WaterSense 2006 Accomplishments Report (4 pp, 452K, About PDF).

Headline: Join the Water Efficiency Bandwagon
Text: With the release of the high-efficiency toilet specification, WaterSense is pleased to invite manufacturers, retailers and distributors that share a commitment to water efficiency to become program partners.

Headline: Labeled Toilets Hit the Shelves
Text: The WaterSense label appears on its first products—high-efficiency toilets. Replacing your older, existing toilet with a WaterSense labeled model could save 4,000 gallons per year without sacrificing performance!

Headline: Labeled Faucets Stop Washing $ Down the Drain
Text: The WaterSense label is awarded to bathroom sink faucets and faucet accessories for the first time! Find WaterSense labeled bathroom sink faucets or faucet accessories.

Headline: 2007 Accomplishments Report
Text: Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the WaterSense 2007 Accomplishments Report (4 pp, 452K, About PDF).

Headline: State Organizations join the State Challenge
Text: The WaterSense State Challenge helps state organizations build a state network of WaterSense partners to provide consistency in educating the public and will amplify statewide efforts to make water efficiency a priority.

Headline: Toilet Selection Tops 100!
Text: Less than one year after hitting the shelves, more than 100 models of high-efficiency toilets have earned the WaterSense label.

Headline: Take the WaterSense Pledge!
Text: WaterSense offers simple steps and a pledge to help consumers reduce their household water use by 30% in 2008.

Headline: WaterSense Kids Website Launched
Text: WaterSense proudly announces its new kids website where kids can play "Test Your WaterSense," and educators can download helpful water-efficiency resources.

Headline: WaterSense TODAY SHOW Debut
Text: WaterSense is featured on the TODAY SHOW during a segment about "greening your bathroom." Please note that households waste 11,000 gallons per year, not 900 billion gallons as stated by the host.

Headline: Three Cheers for the Partners of the Year!
Text: WaterSense recognized a select group of partners for their outstanding accomplishments in increasing water efficiency (2 pp, 857K, About PDF) across the country. Read the press release to learn more.

Headline: WaterSense Pilots New Homes
Text: WaterSense builder partner Vanguard Homes, constructed the first home in the nation to meet EPA's Draft Single-Family New Home Specification. Read the press release and view the news coverage.

Headline: 2008 Accomplishments Report
Text: Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the WaterSense 2008 Accomplishments Report (4 pp, 796K, About PDF).

Headline: Stop That Leak!
Text: March 16-20, 2009, marks WaterSense's first Fix a Leak Week, a time to remind Americans of the environmental and economic benefits to fixing leaks from household plumbing fixtures and irrigation systems. Read the press release.

Headline: Wash the Dishes, Save Some Water
Text: WaterSense issues a Notification of Intent (NOI) to develop a specification for pre-rinse spray valves in order to improve water and energy efficiency. Visit the Pre-Rinse Spray Valves page for more information.

Headline: Never Too Young to Save Water
Text: WaterSense has developed lessons for grades 3-5 that focus on saving water through finding leaks. The free resources offer step-by-step instructions for teachers and include ready-made worksheets for students.

Headline: Flushing Urinals Earn the WaterSense Label
Text: The WaterSense label is available for flushing urinals. Find WaterSense Labeled Urinals.

Headline: Kudos to the Partners of the Year!
Text: The 2009 Partner of the Year Award winners (4 pp, 892K, About PDF) have made extraordinary efforts to advance the WaterSense program and show how working together can help customers and communities of all sizes save water. Read the press release.

Headline: WaterSense Labeled New Homes are on the Way!
Text: WaterSense labeled new homes are designed to reduce residential water use indoors and outdoors. Buying a WaterSense labeled new home is a smart investment that will help save water for your community and future generations.

Headline: 2009 Accomplishments Report
Text: Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the 2009 Accomplishments Report (6 pp, 1.1MB, About PDF).

Headline: WaterSense Facebook Fan Page Launched
Text: Become a fan of WaterSense today and get updates on WaterSense activities and fun facts about saving water.

Headline: WaterSense Labeled Showerheads
Text: The WaterSense label is awarded to showerheads for the first time! Find WaterSense Labeled Showerheads.

Headline: 2nd Annual Fix a Leak Week
Text: From March 15-21, WaterSense partners and other organizations helped spread the word, hosting dozens of events in the second-annual WaterSense Fix a Leak Week. Read the press release.

Headline: Flo Hits the Road
Text: WaterSense launches We're for Water, a national outreach campaign to help consumers save water. The campaign kicked off with a cross-country road trip from Los Angeles to New York City. Read the press release.

Headline: WaterSense Joins Twitter
Text:
Follow Flo and be the first to hear about exciting program news and fun facts.

https://twitter.com/epawatersense

Headline: And the Winners Are...
Text: Congratulations to the 2010 WaterSense Partners of the Year! (4 pp, 1MB, About PDF) Read the press release.

Headline: First WaterSense Labeled New Homes!
Text: WaterSense builder partner KB Home has constructed the first WaterSense labeled new homes in Roseville, California. Read the press release.

Headline: 2010 Accomplishments Report
Text: Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the 2010 Accomplishments Report (6 pp, 1.1MB, About PDF).

Headline: We're For Water—Join the Chase!
Text: WaterSense teamed up with the Arizona Municipal Water Users Association (AMWUA) to promote the third annual Fix a Leak Week, March 14-20, 2011.

Headline: 2011 Partner of the Year Awards
Text: EPA announced the 2011 WaterSense Partners of the Year (4 pp, 535K, About PDF) and celebrated an important milestone for WaterSense: the program’s fifth anniversary.

Headline: Irrigation Gets Smart
Text: Irrigation controllers are the first outdoor product eligible to earn the WaterSense label.

Headline: Celebrating 40 Years of Clean Water
Text: 2012 marks the 40th anniversary of the Clean Water Act, the nation's law for protecting our most irreplaceable resource.

Headline: 2011 Accomplishments Report
Text: Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the 2011 Accomplishments Report (3 pp, 4.6MB, About PDF).

Headline: Welcome Water Savings to the Neighborhood!
Text: zHome – the ultra-sustainable, 10-unit townhome development in Issaquah, WA that is redefining the future of housing – is also the first community in the nation in which every home has earned the WaterSense label for new homes.

Headline: Fix a Leak Week 2012 was bigger than ever!
Text: The2012 Fix a Leak Week was bigger than ever before! WaterSense teamed up with our partners to promote the fourth annual Fix a Leak Week, March 12-18, 2012.

Headline: The First Irrigation Controller Earns the WaterSense Label
Text: The first of many WaterSense labeled weather-based irrigation controllers earns the WaterSense label.

Headline: 2012 Partner of the Year Awards
Text: Congratulations to the winners of the 2012 Partner of the Year Awards! (5 pp, 1MB, About PDF).

Headline: WaterSense Opens the Door to Label Units in Multi-Family Buildings!
Text: Homes in multifamily buildings are now eligible for the WaterSense label!

Headline: 2012 Accomplishments Report
Text: Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the 2012 Accomplishments Report (3 pp, 3.7MB, About PDF).

Headline: Fix a Leak Week 2013!
Text: This year's Fix a Leak Week was the most successful yet! More than 30 events were coordinated by WaterSense partners across the U.S. and Canada to promote the importance of finding and fixing leaks in your home.

Headline: Water-Smart Landscape Photo Contest
Text: Over the course of the year, WaterSense collected hundreds of photos of water-smart landscapes. You can view all of these (and more!) in the Water-Smart Landscape Photo Gallery in the Outdoor section of the website.

Headline: Pre-Rinse Spray Valve Specification Release
Text: The final WaterSense Specification for Commercial Pre-Rinse Spray Valves (PRSVs) was released! Manufacturers whose products meet the specification may use both the WaterSense and ENERGY STAR labels to highlight the efficiencies of those models.

Headline: 2013 Partner of the Year Awards
Text: Congratulations to the winners of the 2013 Partner of the Year Awards! (6 pp, 2MB, About PDF).

Headline: 2013 Accomplishments Report
Text: 2013 was WaterSense's best year yet! Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the 2013 Accomplishments Report (3 pp, 818K, About PDF).

Headline: H2Otel Challenge Launch!
Text: EPA launched the WaterSense H2Otel Challenge in order to encourage hotels to evaluate their water use and adopt water-saving products and best management practices.

Headline: First issue of the WaterSense Blueprint!
Text: The WaterSense Blueprint is a new quarterly newsletter focused on bringing the latest information and updates on the WaterSense New Homes program.

Headline: Fix a Leak Week
Text: This year, WaterSense partners from across the U.S. and Canada joined EPA in the race to chase down leaks (4 pp, 4MB, About PDF). More than 50 events (that we know of!) were hosted by WaterSense partners.

Headline: Sprinkler Spruce-Up
Text: Did you know as much as 50% of the water we use outdoors is wasted from inefficient watering methods and systems?! Sprinkler Spruce-Up is a WaterSense campaign to help homeowners make sure their watering systems are working properly before they ramp up their watering during the warmer months.

Headline: Shower Better
Text: Just in time for National Energy Action Month, our Shower Better campaign runs the entire month of October! We know that cutting down time in the shower can be hard to do, but Americans can "shower better" by switching out old showerheads for WaterSense labeled models.

Headline: 2014 Partner of the Year Awards
Text: Congratulations to the winners of the 2014 Partner of the Year Awards! (7 pp, 2MB, About PDF).

Headline: 2014 Accomplishments
Text: 2014 was another great year for WaterSense! Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the 2014 Accomplishments Report (3 pp, 817.8K, About PDF).

Headline: Fix a Leak Week
Text: For the seventh year running, WaterSense partners from across the U.S. and Canada joined EPA in the race to chase down leaks! Participation in Fix a Leak Week 2015 (4 pp, 4MB, About PDF) has continued to grow year after year, and 2015 was no exception.

Headline: Flo Debuts in Video
Text: Flo debuts in her first animated video to show how to find and fix leaks.

Headline: Sprinkler Spruce-Up Video
Text: Joe the Pro joins Flo in the 2nd animated video to remind people to spruce-up your irrigation system with 4 simple steps—inspect, connect, direct, and select.

Headline: #WaterSaving Yard
Text: During our #watersaving yard photo challenge we received submissions showcasing how beautiful a water saving yard can be!

Headline: When In Drought (Or Not) Video
Text: Flo is joined by her dog in this video showcasing what you can do during a drought or just during the hot summer months to save water.

Headline: Shower Better Video
Text: In Flo's last video for 2015, Flo describes what you can do to save water in the shower.

Headline: 2015 Partner of the Year Awards
Text: Congratulations to the winners of the 2015 Partner of the Year Awards! (8 pp, 2MB, About PDF).

Headline: Flushometer-Valve Toilet Spec Release
Text: To help commercial facilities become more water–efficient, WaterSense has released a Specification for Flushometer–Valve Water Closets.
column19: WaterSense was launched in June 2006 and since that time we’ve seen the number of our partners and labeled products grow and grow

Headline: 2015 Accomplishments
Text: WaterSense partners went big this year with savings. Read more on how WaterSense helped save water in the 2015 Accomplishments Report (3 pp, 2.7MB, About PDF).

Headline: Fix A Leak Week 2016
Text:
Leak Detectives were in full force for the eighth annual Fix a Leak Week (8 pp, 2MB, About PDF).

WaterSense partners across the country held over 60 events from 5Ks to workshops and giveaways.

Headline: 10 Years of WaterSense
Text: WaterSense was launched in June 2006 and since that time we’ve seen the number of our partners and labeled products grow and grow.  Working hard to save water for future generations!

Headline: 2016 Partner of the Year Awards
Text: Awarding our highest honors as Partners of the Year, we celebrated the partners who gave us their best in advancing and promoting WaterSense and water efficiency.

Headline: 2016 Accomplishments
Text: WaterSense labeled products have helped saved a cumulative 2.1 trillion gallons of water since 2006! That's more than the amount of water used by all U.S. households for 75 days! Read the full 2016 Accomplishments Report (8 pp, 6MB, About PDF).

Headline: Fix A Leak Week 2017
Text: WaterSense partners across the U.S. and Canada joined EPA in the ninth annual Fix a Leak Week (2 pp, 523 K, About PDF).

Headline: SPRAY SPRINKLER BODIES SPEC RELEASE
Text: We’re saying goodbye to excessive flow rates, misting, fogging, and uneven coverage in landscape irrigation sprinklers.

Headline: PARTNER OF THE YEAR AWARDS 10th GATHERING
Text: Presenting 2017’s Sustained Excellence, Partners of the Year, and Excellence Award winners.

Headline: Introducing the EPA Water Score for Multifamily Housing
Text: Property managers can now generate an EPA 1–100 water score to evaluate water consumption of a whole multifamily property.

Headline: "Demonstrated Success"
Text: The Office of Inspector General (OIG) publishes a report, “EPA’s Voluntary WaterSense Program Demonstrated Success,” which calls WaterSense a sound model for voluntary programs.

Headline: 2017 Accomplishments
Text: Through the end of 2017, WaterSense has helped Americans save a cumulative 2.7 trillion gallons of water! Read the 2017 Accomplishments Report (3 pp, 8MB, About PDF).

Headline: Version 2.0 WaterSense Homes
Text: WaterSense releases a Notice of Intent (NOI) to develop version 2.0 of the specification and certification requirements for WaterSense labeled homes.

Headline: EPA's 10th annual Fix a Leak Week
Text: Fix a Leak Week 2018 featured events including festivals, races, giveaways, and workshops hosted by WaterSense partners across the nation and Canada. Read the campaign summary (2 pp, 132K, About PDF).

Headline: 2018 Partner of the Year Awards
Text: Meet the nine Sustained Excellence Award winners, four WaterSense Partners of the Year, and eight Excellence Award winners who help advance and promote WaterSense and water efficiency.

Headline: WaterSense Authorization
Text: America’s Water Infrastructure Act is signed into law which includes the formal authorization of the Environmental Protection Agency’s WaterSense program. The act transitions WaterSense from a “discretionary” program to federal legal status.

Headline: Sunset of Pre-Rinse Spray Valves
Text: WaterSense continues to fulfil its mission to transform the marketplace with the addition of the new U.S. Department of Energy rule requiring Pre-Rinse Spray Valves (PRSVs) sold in the U.S. to meet or exceed the WaterSense efficiency criteria. WaterSense sunsets its PRSV specification.

Headline: Fix a Leak Week
Text: WaterSense partners across the U.S. and Canada will be joining EPA in the annual Fix a Leak Week.
